works.title: iPhone Blog
works.label: Web Design
works.description: There are a lot of web sites which reviewing mobile applications. I even cannot count how much of them i had added to my bookmarks for further reading. But mostly they do not have any filters by price, categories and etc. That was quite important for me and i desided to create self mobile news resource with elaborate interface. In time of developing i was learning in university and do not have enought time and because of it after i draw interface i sold it to related project.
